description.en:
Limit the maximum number of animals in husbandry pens, pastures, and buildings.
Full multiplayer support with permission system - admins can modify any pen, farm managers can modify their farm's pens.
ALPHA RELEASE - Console commands only. GUI dialog coming in future update.
Features: - Set custom animal limits per pen (cannot exceed original capacity) - Limits persist across save/load - Full multiplayer support with permission system
Usage: 1. Walk to any animal loading trigger and press L to view current limits 2. Use console commands to change limits: - lhaList: Show all husbandries with limits - lhaSet <index> <limit>: Set a custom limit - lhaReset <index>: Reset to original capacity
Changelog: 0.1.0.0: - First functional release - Console commands for limit management - Keybind (L) shows pen info at animal triggers - Savegame persistence - Full multiplayer support
